feature.name: chartcustomizers
feature.title: Multiple Chart Customizers
feature.description: How to make various changes to a generated chart using the JFreeChart API, using one or more chart customizer on the same report.
feature.content:
Multiple Chart Customizers
To provide full control over chart customization even when using the built-in chart component, JasperReports can make use of a chart customizer implementation associated with the chart element.
